response.overview: A mysterious stranger works outside the law and keeps his objectives hidden, trusting no one. While his demeanor is paradoxically focused and dreamlike all at once, he embarks on a journey that not only takes him across Spain, but also through his own consciousness.
response.tagline: For every way in, there is another way out.
response.title: The Limits of Control

titles.title: The Limits of Control - Der geheimnisvolle Killer
